import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useInput } from '../Data/useInput' const dispensedItems = [] function Dispensed() { const [StockLimit, setStockLimit] = useState('') const currentStock = { BCG: 320, DMR: 490, IPV: 170, VAT: 900, DBCG: 805 } const { value: vaccine, bind: bindVaccine, reset: resetVaccine } = useInput(''); const { value: child, bind: bindChild, reset: resetChild } = useInput(''); const { value: quantity, bind: bindQuantity, reset: resetQuantity } = useInput(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispensedItems.push({ "VaccineName": vaccine, "childVaccined": child, "stockQuantityDispensed": quantity }); console.clear() // resetVaccine() // resetChild() // resetQuantity() console.log(dispensedItems) } return (

Dispensed Vaccines

Current Stock

Vaccine Name Vaccine Stock Quantity
{key[0]}{key[1]}
{dispensedItems?
{dispensedItems.map(key => ( ))}
Vaccine Name Children Vaccinated Vaccine Stock Quantity
{key.VaccineName}{key.childVaccined}{key.stockQuantityDispensed}
:""}
) } export default Dispensed
